content: cute little keychain perfect for all us secret mince pie lovers out there you know you want to…… 3 page written pattern suitable for beginner/intermediate level this item can be made bigger by increasing wpi to recreate in aran use a 4mm hook and increase wool amount by 60% to recreate in chunky use a 5mm hook and increase wool amount by 200% © 2022 teri hamilton crochet at teri s by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
